Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Suddenly the whole reef lurched toward the ship. No reef, a sea monster! A Chelus Steeleater! For a moment, we lost it in the surf. The Skipper shrieked. The whole ship vaulted upward. The crew catapulted in every direction. This creature had no interest in eating the fleshy sailors bobbing in the briny blue waves. It lunged onto the vessel. Steel plating snapped in the Chelus’s vice-like beak. We scrambled for anything that floated as the great behemoth decimated the ship’s armor as if it were the Fish Taco Special.”— Sailor Sammy Sellis, “RV-90210: Seashells by the Seashore.”
“突然之间，一片礁脉出现在船体面前，不是礁脉，而是海怪！一只蛇颈食铁兽！只是一瞬之间，我们便落入了海中，跳跃者沉默了。整艘船立了起来。船员四散而逃。但这头生物对于卷入海浪中的水手们似乎并不感兴趣。它大口地咀嚼起了船体，钢板成为了它的食物。在那只巨兽以船板为食，仿佛那是一道珍馐时，我们还在搜索着任何能够利用的漂浮物。”- 水手萨米·赛利斯，“RV-90210：海岸上的灾难。”

“The Chelus Clutchmother rammed the ship with a huge horn on its back. As the ship took on water, I jumped into a half-full apple barrel. The Chelus took another bite out of the side of the ship. My barrel tipped overboard. I floated away watching while it laid a large egg that hatched moments later. The young Chelus joined its mother eating the boat. As I floated away from the screaming sailors, my heart was warmed by the stirring thought of mother and child completing the circle of life together.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-22300X: Forlorn Fantasy Destinations”
“船体刚刚落入水中，巨兽便用背上的巨角撞了过来。我跳入了一个没有装满的苹果桶中。蛇颈兽又对着船的另一边咬了一口，我所在的桶也因此落入了海中。我一边漂走，一边注视着它产下了一个巨大的蛋，不久之后，它便孵化了，蛇颈幼崽与它的母亲一起啃食着船体。当我再也听不到水手的尖叫声后，我的心开始变得温暖起来，这对母子一起完成生命循环的举动令我备受鼓舞。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-22300X：凄凉幻想终点”

“The Clutchmother’s genetic variations demonstrate a common ancestry from that of homeworld. This proves they were brought here. But by whom, and why? Wait. I hear tapping. The egg is hatching! This is most exciting. Bring up OVA-monitor on Sea-Hold station. See that? A crack on the egg. That smell? Strong. Acrid. It must use bio-organic acid to break down its shell. No wait. Oh no! The Spawn is burrowing into the research lab. Stay back! It will… *[Expletive Redacted*] No! Shoot her! Shoot her!”— Professor Sandro “Cosmo” Welker, “RV-000331S: Planetary Survey: Transgalaxy Biological Contamination Unit”

“雌兽的基因突变代表着它与我故乡内的一种生物有着相同的祖先，这也证明了它们是被人为带到这里的。到底是谁干的？为什么要这么做？等一下，我听到了敲击声，蛋要孵化了！这场面真令人激动。调出海上堡垒监测站的 OVA 监视器画面。看到了吗？蛋上的裂痕。什么味道？强烈，具有腐蚀性。它一定是在用这种生化有机酸液破坏蛋壳。不，等一下。哦，不！新生兽正在钻入实验室。退后！它会......*[咒骂*]不！射击！射击！”- 桑德罗·“原子”·维克尔教授，“RV-000331S：星球调查：跨星系生物交感单位”

Changed '[]' into '*[*]' where the '[]' were intended to be displayed to the player - i.e. where it doesn't concern markup text. We need to be sure to change this in the localized text too, as this change was made after the text was send out for localization. Please remove this comment when the changes are made, but only after verifying this was done for all languages supported at launch.
Edit: shell? -> shell.

“I swim with many ocean dwellers, but none is as protective of the gentle sea-creatures as the Octowhale. They are often found swimming with Chelus, performing nurturing tasks for those it deems a friend. When my submersible lost power, an Octowhale lifted us from the depths, so that we could surface for air. It is as though it senses distress and wants to help. When threatened it can shoot a thick glop of biotoxic ink from its blowhole, but I’ve never observed it do so predatorially.”— Marine Biologist, Dr. Ariel Triton, “RV-3423S: Under the Sea”

“我与许多海洋生物一起游过泳，其中最具保护性的非八爪鲸莫属。它们通常会与蛇颈兽同行，为它们提供一些友善的帮助。当我的潜水器能源耗尽时，一只八爪鲸将我们抬到了水面上，使我们得以再次呼吸到空气。它仿佛能够感应到生物散发出的焦虑，并很乐意帮助其他生物排忧解难。当它受到威胁时，它会从气孔中喷出剧毒汁液，但我从来没有见到它以这种方式进行主动攻击。”- 海洋生物学家，阿里尔·特里顿博士，“RV-3423S：海底”

“Today, my research camp was attacked by a Spacer Junkship. My crew jumped into the submersible. One of the enraged cannibals grabbed the air line. Before he could cut it, a mass of tentacles constricted the man. An Elder Octowhale surfaced, spraying the Junkship with toxic ink. The Spacers returned fire. The Elder let out a screaming song, and other Octowhales joined the attack. I watched in awe as this gentle monster rammed the ship with a percussive force that cracked the ship apart. I’ve renewed my appreciation for Octowhales.”— Marine Biologist, Dr. Ariel Triton, “RV-3423S: Under the Sea”

“今天，我的研究营地被一艘太空掠夺者垃圾船攻击了。我的队员们跳入了一艘潜水器中，其中一个愤怒的食人族一把抓住了空气管道，在他切断管道之前，一团触手将他紧紧缠住。一只壮年八爪鲸浮出水面，向那艘垃圾船喷射了有毒汁液。太空掠夺者们立刻反击，这只壮年八爪鲸发出了一阵尖锐的歌声，几只八爪鲸响应号召，加入了这场战斗。我亲眼目睹了这种温和生物用自己强大的力量将船体撞得粉碎，这刷新了我对八爪鲸的认知。”- 海洋生物学家，阿里尔·特里顿博士，“RV-3423S：海底”
